Week 2

DOM

  • the document object model
  • a structure checking model
  • structure
    • head
    • body
  • Markup Validation Service

Tags

<h1>Hello World </h1>

Types of Tags

  • block
    • can take width and height
    • takes up whole width
  • inline
    • cannot take width and height

Common Tags

  • heading
    • <h1>, <h2>
    • have syntax and semantics
  • paragraphs
    • <p> </p>
    • should only contain inline elements
  • Divs
    • <div> </div>
    • used for groupings
  • ordered lists
<ol>
    <li> item one </li>
    <li> item two </li>
</ol>
  • unordered list
<ul>
    <li> item one </li>
    <li> item two </li>
</ul>
  • line break
    • <br>

Common Attributes

  • provide additional information
  • specified in the start tag
  • come in name ←→ value pairs
  • images

<img src = "pic.jpg" alt = "image of pic"/>

Semantic Tags

  • begin with classifying into divs
<div class = "header"> </div>
<div class = "section> </div>
  • <header> </header>
    • important info of the page
  • <nav> </nav>
    • link to other pages of the sides
  • <footer> </footer>
    • bottom of page for extra info
  • <figure> </figure>
    • caption
    • multi-media
